page.title: 16GRID SQUARE DESCRIPTION CONT
page.content: area.A flint grinding mill is being restored by the Borough Council(this is just outside our study area at 917363) One farm and plant nursery 9338:the B5066 passes through the middle square running NNW to SSE. This road is very straight here and was built in the 18thCentury as a turnpike road linking Cheadle(Staffs) with Sandon(9529).Blacklake Plantation(9338) School House has been "gentrified" and landscaped for a businessman who owns a discount warehouse in Stoke-on-Trent. Some of the woodland has recently been felled and at present not replanted. There was some local opposition to this by conservationists but apparently to no avail. 9337:there are 2 farms, a large farm called Manor Farm and a small farm called Idlerock Farm.Idlerocks is a hamlet of 9 houses in the SW corner.
